title: Educator Resource Packet: Into the World There Came A Soul Called Ida by Ivan Albright
listing_description: To render this haunting portrait, Albright used a precise painting technique that encourages viewers to look at all the details that convey Ida's persona, such as clothing, accessories, and setting.
copy: To render this haunting portrait, Albright used a precise painting technique that encourages viewers to look at all the details that convey Ida's persona, such as clothing, accessories, and setting. This teaching packet includes an essay, discussion questions, activity ideas, a glossary, and an image of the artwork
